short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TouchBase enhances sales with AI-driven Outreach and Engage products, enabling personalized emails, LinkedIn engagement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your sales process with TouchBase AI - an innovative solution for sales professionals, account executives, sales development representatives, and cold email marketers worldwide.
Our products, Outreach and Engage, combine cutting-edge AI technology and thorough online research to help you connect with your prospects in a compelling and personalized way.

TouchBase Outreach, a SaaS product designed for sales development teams, streamlines the drafting of cold emails. It leverages your prospect's LinkedIn profile and other online content about their company to draft compelling emails with a high probability of positive responses.

TouchBase Engage allows you to generate ideas for engaging and connecting with prospects through LinkedIn comments and messages. Conversing with your connections has never been this effortless and effective.

With TouchBase AI, deliver your revenue pipeline more efficiently than ever. Our products are advanced in research and accurate and creative in writing copies.

Key Features:
AI Assistant for Sales Professionals: Draft and send AI-powered persuasive emails.
LinkedIn Prospecting using AI: Engage in meaningful and personalized LinkedIn conversations.
Integration: Seamlessly integrates with Hubspot and Salesforce. Future integrations with SalesLoft, Outreach, Pipedrive, and Sales Navigator are coming soon.
Advanced Technology: Uses GPT-4, LLama, and PaLM, trained on billions of sales conversations for optimal performance.
Constant updates: Updates every 2 weeks for the best user experience.
Free to use: Enjoy the power of AI at no cost.

Get started with TouchBase AI today, and transform your outbound prospecting and LinkedIn engagement using state-of-the-art AI technology. Experience the easiest way to deliver a revenue pipeline, designed by sales and AI leaders. Your AI-powered sales journey begins here.
